name: LABYRINTH (itch) (juanc01)
description:
I am a game developer for video game programming.

Labyrinth is a 3D video game.

The game is about grab the cube and then insert the base, it's two cubes and two bases to open the door, go to the next mission.

there are three areas.

Instructions

                        Keyboard

Button   A                          Left

Button   D                         Right

Button   W                       Go ahead

Button   S                          Back

Mouse left button pressed        

Mouse release right button

looking at the cube that glows yellow, then pick up the cube.
